Package com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter.converters

Contains basic classes to customize the conversion processess.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    COLUMNConverter
    Tag converter for <column> control tags.
    DEFAULTAreaHeaderHandler
    Default identification handler for area headers.
    DEFAULTConverter
    Default tag converter.
    DEFAULTMapxmlTransformer
    Implements a IMapxmlTransformer.
    FIELDConverter
    Tag converter for <field> control tags.
    LABELConverter
    Tag converter for <label> control tags.
    LiteralAreaHeaderHandler
    Area header handler which tries to use literals in the row above the grid area as header.
    ROWTABLEAREA2Converter
    Tag converter for <rowtableare2> control tags.
    TEXTGRIDSSS2Converter
    Tag converter for <textgridsss2> control tags.
    TEXTIDConversionListener
    An example listener which generates localization files and corresponding textids.
    UnderlineAreaHeaderHandler
    Area header handler which tries to use underlined literals in the row above the grid area as header.

Package com.softwareag.natural.mapconverter.converters Description

Contains basic classes to customize the conversion processess.

Basic Handlers, Converters and Listeners

The package contains basic area header handlers and tag converters for the most frequently used layout controls. It also contains a basic conversion listener which creates textids and corresponding message files as a localization example. You'll find the sourcecode for most of the classes in /cisnatural/njxmapconverter/examplesrc
